TEXT.TITLE: SOFTWARE PUBLISHING <SPCO> USING SMALLER DISKS
TEXT.BODY: Software Publishing Corp said it has converted all of its programs to the three and a half inch disk format required to run on International Business Machines Corp's <IBM> new Personal System/2 computers. Reuter
